mapper.select: SELECT msgId, fieldName, seq, colType, colLength, colReqType, colWorkType FROM tbl_msg_info WHERE msgId = #{msgId} AND msgType = #{msgType} ORDER BY SEQ
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_vehicletraceinfo ( ServiceId, Version, VIN, NadId, MoId, gatherStartDate, gatherStartTime, lon, lat, heading, objStatic, objDynamic, updateDate, insertDate ) VALUES ( #{ServiceId}, #{Version}, #{VIN}, #{NadId}, #{MoId}, #{gatherStartDate}, #{gatherStartTime}, #{lon}, #{lat}, #{heading}, #{objStatic}, #{objDynamic}, NOW(), NOW() ) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE gatherStartDate = #{gatherStartDate}, gatherStartTime = #{gatherStartTime}, lon = #{lon}, lat = #{lat}, heading = #{heading}, objStatic = #{objStatic}, objDynamic = #{objDynamic}, updateDate = NOW()

INSERT INTO tbl_vehiclestatusinfo ( ServiceId, Version, VIN, NadId, MoId, drivingStatus, doorOpen, engineStatus, transmission, velocity, steering, control, routeLine, updateDate, insertDate ) VALUES ( #{ServiceId}, #{Version}, #{VIN}, #{NadId}, #{MoId}, #{drivingStatus}, #{doorOpen}, #{engineStatus}, #{transmission}, #{velocity}, #{steering}, #{control}, 0, NOW(), NOW() ) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE drivingStatus = #{drivingStatus}, doorOpen = #{doorOpen}, engineStatus = #{engineStatus}, transmission = #{transmission}, velocity = #{velocity}, steering = #{steering}, control = #{control}, updateDate = NOW()
